Posts.Content: You'll find across different forums that BIRADS 4 is a 20% of cancer. Searching google too much might scare you into too thinking too much about it. Don't worry yourself until the doctor gives you the official interpretation.
Posts.Title: concerned newbie

Posts.Content: I would have to agree, wigs made me feel a little more "normal." I only use it for job interviews, when I want to feel a little normal, and places where I don't want people staring at my bald head. Best of luck to you.
Posts.Title: How much did you use your wig during hair-loss chemo?
